settings.config: #-*- coding:utf-8 -*- #config need to be written by python. #cannot use "import" statement. #list of available modules in this config is here: # #list of available internal variable in this config is here: # user-defined_vars as dictionary → defined in setting xml with var element. # workdir as str → The directory location where main.py exists. # environment as dictionary → Environment vars of working PC.
